body:
Marcel:


It's impossible to know what solution would be best for you since you don't divulge much about what you are trying to do, but other tools you may want to look at are:


OpenStudio: http://openstudio.nrel.gov
Ladybug & Honeybee: http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug
SPOT: http://www.daylightinginnovations.com/spot-home


- Rob


On 5/14/14, 12:46 PM, "Christoph Reinhart" <tito_ at MIT.EDU<mailto:tito_ at MIT.EDU>> wrote:


Hi Marcel,


There are a number of graphical user interface that you can use for Radiance and Daysim. An example tool that provides introductory tutorials and supports daylight availability and glare analysis is DIVA-for-Rhino (http://diva4rhino.com/).


Best,


Christoph
